landing.p1: Somewhat of a philomath, I'm very analytical, and find pleasure in reasoning about the most varying subjects - from understanding the formation of the universe to the origin of species.
landing.p2: From a young age I realized that I loved solving puzzles, and in programming I found an environment that is filled with them. I got addicted to the process of finding solutions and seeing my work help people on their most mundane tasks.
landing.p3: I enjoy taking challenges, and leveraging from other people's cultures and experiences.

contact.p1: With my expertise and analytical knowledge, I can provide innovative and efficient solutions for your project needs.
contact.p2: I have skills in various programming languages and I am constantly updating myself with new technologies. My goal is to help your company achieve results through customized and high-quality solutions.
contact.p3: Do you think I can help you? Please respond to the questionnaire below!

description.p1: My consulting cost starts at $40.00 USD per hour, billed in 30 minute increments, with a 1 hour minimum purchase required for new clients.
description.p3: Estimates can be given up front, if a clearly defined scope of work is provided.
description.p4: A 1 hour appointment may be required to discuss larger/more complex projects.
description.p5: Any work performed outside of normal business hours or on holidays will be billed at a higher rate.
description.p6: For new clients, consulting hours must be paid in advance.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: My normal service hours are Monday through Friday 9:00am until 6:00pm GMT-3.

description.p1: Google Meet is used to communicate during meetings, although webcams are optional.
description.p2: I prefer not to use other meeting client.

additional_info.title: Can I send you documentation or screenshots before our appointment?

description.p1: After I provide you with a booking link, you may send me whatever information you deem useful.
description.p2: Any and all information sent prior to an appointment will only be reviewed at my own discretion. I'm not required to review any documentation prior to a meeting as that is considered billable time.

description.p1: Due to the nature of the work, there is no warranty on hourly work.
description.p2: Each worked hour is billable regardless of the outcome of said work.
